description:
Axel is 20, but because of his muscle mass, and tatted up body, most think he is 25-27. It is probably easier for him to not get carded and bars.
He wanted to get into straight porn, but since I was somewhat local, he figured he would try a solo. Not sure if he is down for guy-on-guy stuff. He seemed like he would try if he could hide his face, which implies shame, and that's something I never do.
He has a girlfriend who helped pick out his stage name. I think she did a good job. She seemed to know what was up, but he was set against doing guy-on-guy on camera. One thing I didn't notice at the time of the shoot, was in the new tattoo on his ass, there is also a dripping cock. I am trying to figure out what that means, given his reluctance to gay video work.
Axel is very relaxed and works his cock quickly to full mass. He usually just trims his pubes back, but said he had over done it last time. He himself is not a fan of the shaved-up look.
He has an awesome body, with enviable pecs and biceps. He puts those big guns of his to work, stroking out a nice load for us.
As of writing this, he has not indicated he will be back for even a blow job, so next week, stay tuned for Bossy video with me and Lorenzo!
title: Axel - Solo
